Angular Flickr photoset panel directive

Angular Flickr This demo page is an example of using the angular-flickr module. The flick gallery below if the result of the following code: 
module('myApp').value('flickrConfig', {
    user_id: '99179128@N07',
    api_key: '006d5ace5a1ec6e87d501a2753da1bc7'
  })
<div class="container">
    <photoset-panel panel-title="Flickr Photo Sets"></photoset-panel>
</div>
 Check out the GitHub project for more details.
